headline: Q1 earnings pulse check: companies tentative on pharma-specific tariffs
summary: Whilst 2025 outlooks include cost impacts from existing tariffs, companies have not adjusted their guidance for future pharma-specific ones.

headline: Tweedy, Browne Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: As deep value managers, we remain disciplined in our approach, seeking out securities that trade at meaningful discounts to our conservative estimates of intrinsic value.
